sourcesContent:
<template>
  <VApp>
    <v-app-bar app dark color="#333">
      <v-container>
        <v-row justify="center">
          <v-col
            cols="12"
            sm="10"
            md="8"
            lg="6"
            xl="4"
            class="text-center"
          >
            <v-slide-y-transition>
              <v-card :class="headerCardClass">
                <v-card-title :class="headerTitleClass">
                  Farming and Crop Delivery
                </v-card-title>
                <v-card-text :class="headerDescriptionClass">
                  Exploring the world of agriculture and direct-to-consumer crop delivery
                </v-card-text>
              </v-card>
            </v-slide-y-transition>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
      </v-container>
    </v-app-bar>
  </VApp>
</template>

<script>
import {
  VApp,
  VContainer,
  VRow,
  VCol,
  VCard,
  VCardTitle,
  VCardText,
  VSlideYTransition
} from 'vuetify';

export default {
  name: 'AppHeaderSection',
  components: {
    VApp,
    VContainer,
    VRow,
    VCol,
    VCard,
    VCardTitle,
    VCardText,
    VSlideYTransition
  },
  props: {
    headerType: {
      type: String,
      default: 'default' // You can set a default type or leave it blank
    }
  },
  computed: {
    headerCardClass() {
      return {
        'headline-md': this.$vuetify.breakpoint.mdAndUp,
        'headline-sm-and-down': this.$vuetify.breakpoint.smAndDown,
        'body-md': this.$vuetify.breakpoint.mdAndUp,
        'body-sm-and-down': this.$vuetify.breakpoint.smAndDown,
        // Add other classes based on the header type
        'header-type-default': this.headerType === 'default',
        'header-type-special': this.headerType === 'special',
        // Add more classes as needed
      };
    },
    headerTitleClass() {
      // You can define specific classes for the title based on the type
      return {
        'header-title-default': this.headerType === 'default',
        'header-title-special': this.headerType === 'special',
        // Add more classes as needed
      };
    },
    headerDescriptionClass() {
      // You can define specific classes for the description based on the type
      return {
        'header-description-default': this.headerType === 'default',
        'header-description-special': this.headerType === 'special',
        // Add more classes as needed
      };
    }
  }
};
</script>

<style>
/* Your shared styles */

/* Example of specific styles for a special header type */
.header-type-special {
  background-color: #ffcc00; /* Yellow background for special headers */
}

/* Example of specific styles for a special header title */
.header-title-special {
  color: #ff3300; /* Red text color for special headers */
}

/* Example of specific styles for a special header description */
.header-description-special {
  font-weight: bold; /* Bold text for special headers */
}
</style>
